title: Everything you wanted to know about resinHUP
text: View our 'Everything you've wanted to know about the resin Host UPdater, but were afraid to ask' on Slideshare to learn more about how our Host Updater works

title: Constructing calls to the resin.io API
text: At the heart of the resin.io platform sits the API and we've overhauled the API documentation to give you a greater in depth view on how to leverage this in your solutions.

title: Deploying edge workflows with Losant Edge Compute and resin.io
text: Losant Edge Compute offers developers a visual, drag-and-drop editor for building logic workflows, which can be remotely deployed to any number of edge devices. Learn more about how this can be combined with resinIO to build a fully managed and maintainable drag and drop workflow

title: Work with us!
text: We're looking for a Senior Full-stack Software Engineer and more.
